articles.description: Nomura hopes to release Part 2 “ASAP”
articles.content:
Final Fantasy 7 Remake director Tetsuya Nomura has suggested that future instalments in the episodic title could focus on smaller sections of the original game, in order to release them faster.
The comments come from the Japanese Ultimania book, quoted and t… [+2263 chars]

articles.title: New device simulates feel of walls, solid objects in virtual reality - Tech Xplore
